snippet: Denver Broncos defensive end Elvis Dumervil has been charged with aggravated assault with a firearm in Florida.
abstract: Denver Broncos defensive end Elvis Dumervil is facing a third-degree felony charge for aggravated assault with a firearm in Miami-Dade County.
lead_paragraph: Denver Broncos defensive end Elvis Dumervil has been charged with aggravated assault with a firearm in Florida.

headline.seo: Broncos’ Elvis Dumervil Charged With Aggravated Assault
headline.main: Broncos’ Dumervil Charged With Aggravated Assault
